snippet.title: D' (ディーダッシュ) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

D' (pronounced Dee Dash) is a sci-fi survival horror game for one or two players. If played with two players the game becomes a simultaneous co-op game.

The story begins with that Louis and Dick are suddenly awakened from the ships's alarm while en route to an important planetary colonization assignment with their space transport ship "Sophia".

In this game the player/s has/have to find important keycards, weapons and fight bosses. There are enemies all around the spaceship and it is import to avoid them (and sometimes also their shots), as health will not also drain drastically if touched but it will also keep on draining for a few seconds after killed the alien or avoided contact with it.
